default.$description: badge.borderRadius.default — Default badge border radius - pill shape (32px). Fully rounded ends create friendly, approachable appearance. Standard for most badge use cases.

square.$description: badge.borderRadius.square — Square badge border radius (4px). Slightly rounded corners for a more formal, technical appearance. Use for: code version tags, technical identifiers, formal status badges.

lg.$description: badge.fontSize.lg — Large badge font size (12px). Use for: lg badges, better readability for longer text, accessibility-focused implementations.

md.$description: badge.fontSize.md — Medium badge font size (11px). DEFAULT. Use for: standard badges, most status and category labels. Optimal balance of compactness and readability.

sm.$description: badge.fontSize.sm — Small badge font size (9px). Use for: sm badges, short labels in tight spaces. Compact but still readable.

xl.$description: badge.fontSize.xl — Extra large badge font size (14px). Use for: xl badges, maximum readability, prominent promotional badges.

xs.$description: badge.fontSize.xs — Extra small badge font size (8px). Use for: xs badges, minimal count indicators. Very compact, may have reduced readability - use sparingly.

fontWeight.$description: badge.fontWeight — Badge font weight (600). Semibold ensures badges stand out from surrounding body text. Provides emphasis without overwhelming.

lg.$description: badge.height.lg — Large badge height (26px). Use for: prominent status indicators, hero section badges, featured tags, marketing callouts. More visual weight.

md.$description: badge.height.md — Medium badge height (20px). DEFAULT size. Use for: most status badges, category tags, standard notification counts. Balanced visibility and space efficiency.

sm.$description: badge.height.sm — Small badge height (18px). Use for: tight layouts, dense data tables, secondary status indicators. Subtle but readable.

xl.$description: badge.height.xl — Extra large badge height (32px). Use for: high-emphasis badges, promotional tags, standalone status indicators, onboarding highlights. Maximum prominence.

xs.$description: badge.height.xs — Extra small badge height (16px). Use for: inline status dots, minimal notification counts, compact table status indicators. Least intrusive size.

letterSpacing.$description: badge.letterSpacing — Badge letter spacing (0.025em). Slightly wide tracking improves readability at small sizes, especially for uppercase text common in badges.

lg.$description: badge.padding.horizontal.lg — Large horizontal badge padding (12px). Use for: lg badges, longer text, more generous spacing for readability.

md.$description: badge.padding.horizontal.md — Medium horizontal badge padding (10px). DEFAULT. Use for: standard text badges, status labels, category tags. Comfortable text spacing.

sm.$description: badge.padding.horizontal.sm — Small horizontal badge padding (8px). Use for: sm badges, short labels (2-4 characters). Minimal breathing room.

xl.$description: badge.padding.horizontal.xl — Extra large horizontal badge padding (16px). Use for: xl badges, prominent labels, maximum text breathing room.

xs.$description: badge.padding.horizontal.xs — Extra small horizontal badge padding (6px). Tight padding for xs badges. Keeps badge compact for short text like counts or single letters.
